dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud - 1freecarez.com]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 28, 2005 2:59 PM
To: nca@woh.rr.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud - 1freecarez.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Fraud - 1freecarez.com
Date: Mon, 28 Nov 2005 10:37:10 -0500
From: Nick Albert <nca@woh.rr.com>
To: abuse@netfirms.com,  abuse@theplanet.com

The domain www.1freecarez.com has copied my site in most of its entirity.
My website is www.paidride.com. They are running a fraudulent website that
does not even provide member login after paying their paypal fee.

Please remove this domain/website from using your service and provide me
with the individuals contact information so I can proceed futher with legal
action.

The domain currently lists:

Turnkey Sites
35 Regent Road
Cherry Hill, NJ 08003

As the owner.



Thank you,
- -Nick Albert
nca@woh.rr.com
937-962-4533



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDi2+wvK/XpJs6oyURAnYHAJ9P1XAAD6Cp+xMweYHzHXx7FDiJYgCfXwev
8GlpBEldIZ/1xr2/g8q80pU=
=wnRO
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
